hackathon-description-text: take places on June 1-2, 2013. In Pretoria,
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Unisa - University of South Africa, Preller Street, Pretoria 0002, South Africa

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How much impact (quality and quantity) could the solution have? Could this solution solve a big problem or a little one? Could it make a big change or a little change on that problem?
How much progress did they make during the event? Did they start from scratch or build on an existing technology? How creative is the solution?
How good is their plan for next steps? How prepared are they to continue their work beyond the event
How well did the team communicate? How well did they respond to questions from judges?

hackathon-location-address: Unisa - University of South Africa, Preller Street, Pretoria 0002, South Africa
